name: RPM United
description:
The RPM UNITED release is a very special class. It brings together Trainers and Presenters from all corners of the globe to share this fantastic ride in an extremely turbulent time. 

Inspirational music and cycling is our common bond and you will see this in the hearts and faces of the presenters as you watch the class – enjoy! 

A smooth engaging Warm-up sets the road ahead in Don’t Start Now. The track connects us to the road and the workout. The focus here is on cycle set, our basic riding position. 

The Pace track Everywhere is a familiar sound which makes us feel safe and a little reminiscent as we roll flats and terraced climbs.In Track 3, Hills, we begin to train in earnest with a series of slow climbs with heavy climbing Resistance, interlaced with faster climbs that push the heart rate up. Slow for strength and fast for cardio kick – happy training time!The Mixed Terrain track ‘clips’ along as we hold the beat through Ride Easy and Racing until we hit the song of the class in Track 5, Caution. It is powerful, uplifting, driving, indie rock at its best! It is a classic RPM song. Speed Work unites the peloton. You’re Not Aloneenables us to be grateful for what we have and for the experience we have shared over these past few months. Blue Monday climbs us above the global turmoil, steady and driving a retro mountain for the ages.

Another kicker of a release. Teach it with passion, inspiration and energy.
